div.p: The artifacts page provides examples of all the FHIR resources that have been built into this specification. Moreover, the following key example bundles exist.

The EMR message bundle contains the FHIR resources necessary to support case reporting and program monitoring for those individuals diagnosed HIV positive. This message bundle is typically executed from the EMR.

The lab order message bundle contains the FHIR resources necessary to support the initiation of the need for a specimen examination. The lab order is typically issued by the EMR and submitted to the LIS for sample collection to take place.
The lab result message bundle contains the FHIR resources necessary to document the results of the collected specimen sample and submit the results back to the EMR.
The lab cancellation message bundle contains the FHIR resources necessary to support the cancellation of an existing lab order request together with the reason why it was canceled.
The lab rejection message bundle contains the FHIR resources necessary to support the rejection of an existing lab order request together with the reason why it was rejected.
